name: DHL
reviewer_title: DHL is the biggest lying package…
reviewer_review:
DHL is the biggest lying package delivery company.
I waited for a few days for Sami to bring a package and when he does, he puts it in front of the door and then leaves.
There was no one at home, so you understand, someone passing by took it and left.
I get a message from DHL and it tells me that I received the package.
DHL means:
D for Dangerous, H for Hooligans and L for Liars.
I do not recommend this company to anyone, look at the customer reviews!

name: DHL
reviewer_title: Random Parcel for Norway delivered to me in UK…
reviewer_review: Parcel for Norway delivered to UK address (us) eventually after nearly 2 hours of trying i get through to the right department at DHL, there are at least 3 separate 'bits' of DHL that apparently refuse to contact one another, the phone number they gave me on the robot chat doesn't work, the form on the website just goes in a loop, the chat box person told me to destroy the parcel.. and when i eventually found a human on another number (a very pleasant woman) she sounded embarrassed to be working for them, there was supposed to be a survey at the end of the phone call, they lied about that too.. it just cut off. I certainly wouldn't be sending anything with this sham outfit.

name: DHL
reviewer_title: Shittiest delivery service ever
reviewer_review: Shittiest delivery service ever. I got a $500 dollar package that’s just being not delivered! And there’s is nothing they can do according to customer service. I will be getting my package today

name: DHL
reviewer_title: Driver refused to deliver to my house…
reviewer_review: Driver refused to deliver to my house despite giving them a map. The driver needed to be given a compass and some common sense. I had to drive 3 klms to collect. If I could give them zero stars I would. One very unhappy customer.

name: DHL
reviewer_title: The entire DHL experience was a…costly horrific nightmare
reviewer_review: The entire DHL experience was a nightmare with very few exceptions. I was charged $1000 for transporting one suitcase from the U.S. to Portugal. Apparently, I was not given the correct forms that would itemize and show the value of my shipment. The suitcase was stuck in customs in Portugal for two weeks; there was a customer service number for DHL Portugal but it would only ring through to an automated message and hang up. I finally drove an hour to the DHL office to straighten the issue out; they said that they needed a form that they had sent to be returned through their website. Their website would not allow me to attach and return the document. I contacted DHL in the U.S. For the first time, someone was helpful and said that I could send them the form and that they would forward it on; however two days later I was told by DHL Portugal that I had not fulfilled their requirement and that my suitcase would be immediately returned to the U.S. It was impossible to get help from DHL in Portugal and the help from the U.S. was difficult to find and many times clueless. On top of everything else, none of my $1000+ was refunded for the incredible inconvenience. I'd never do business with DHL again and I'd strongly recommend you don't either.

name: DHL
reviewer_title: Received TELEPHONE CALL not email…
reviewer_review: Received TELEPHONE CALL not email saying email would be sent about details of custom duties to be paid. Email not sent. Also sign up process flawed. Captcha code not suitable for colour blind people.

name: DHL
reviewer_title: Wasn't home when tried to deliver
reviewer_review: Wasn't home when tried to deliver, spoke to him through ring doorbell asking to leave parcel in the blue door at side of the house as needed it for my job tomorrow, completly refused my request saying I need to leave with neighbour even when saying none of my neighbours would be home, ended walking off but didn't really understand anything he was saying as didn't talk English, dpd is the better delivery service and everyone else should just close down as they are poor

reviewer_review: Worst experience, very rude and not cooperating

When I called they said the driver collected but clearly they are lying so they contacted the depot to collect again and they still haven’t turned up. It’s been over a week and I’m doing a return so I may miss my refund. If you’re looking for a reliable courier this is not it. I will never use DHL again.

I was all day in my flat and clark stays 9-3Pm Monday to Friday. He said that the driver came and turned around and went away. After that I changed into collecting points. It was PayPoint, CHARLESTON SUPERMARKET, 54-60 Craigmount Road, DUNDEE, DD2 4QF. . The never been there i have been there same day but driver was posted the shop was closed. But it wasn’t closed. Now I don’t know what to do. After 10 days I tried to get in touch with them again, they said it was their mistake that the bar code was missing and tell your seller to report correct barcode and address then we can deliver your parcel. After 14 days they returned the parcel to sender. They will west and damaged / destroyed your beautiful moments. I would like to ask you please don’t use their services. I don’t know what to do. name: DHL
reviewer_title: How are they still in business?
reviewer_review:
DHL have been nothing short of atrocious when I've had the misfortune to have to deal with them. The latest debacle was a parcel ordered from an online retailer on Next Day delivery on Thursday 13th March. The DHL tracking information said it had been received at their depot and was then out for delivery at 10:36 on Friday 14th March and was stop number 44. Sorry, but for starters who, when they have at least 44 parcels to deliver, doesn't start delivering til after 10:30? So it already didn't look good...

The tracker stopped updating at 'The driver is heading to stop 39' at around 7pm and then stated that my parcel had been signed back into the depot at around 8pm. Despite it being their fault it wasn't delivered, no attempt was made at redelivery until Monday 17th March, when I wasn't in - I had requested the delivery for the Friday for a reason, knowing the parcel had to be signed for and I would be in. As I wasn't in, the parcel was left half hanging through the letterbox and wasn't signed for because I wasn't there - for reference, the parcel was an expensive piece of PC hardware.

Customer services were, unsurprisingly, unhelpful and avoiding answering any questions and just saying sorry for the delay. Eventually, I got a 'the depot have said the drivers will be spoken to' about the delivery without a signature and hanging out of the letterbox aspect but the overall delay was ignored. I pressed for a reason for the delay and was eventually lied to, being told my parcel was "unable to be delivered as it could not be located at the time of the delivery attempt." And still no explanation as to why a parcel couldn't be found in a van - it was hardly a needle in a haystack...

...However, the fact that is, they have told an outright lie in the face of the facts! Their own tracker shows that the driver made delivery stop 38 then turned round and went back to the depot - the tracker said the driver was heading for stop 39 for about an hour then said they were back at the depot. No attempt was made to deliver my parcel, it's blatantly obvious that the driver made stop number 38 and then turned around and went back to the depot, either because their driving time was up or they decided it was too late and they wanted to go home.

I confess I don't know exactly how it works but either DHL overloaded the driver and there was no way they would be able to deliver all the parcels in their driving time, or they just decided "it's getting late, I think I'll go home." Regardless, DHL continue to avoid giving answers about this and then when pressed, have just lied instead.

And to be clear, after numerous poor experiences with DHL over the years (later deliveries, insisting something has been delivered when it hasn't, leaving signed for parcels at someone else's address without a signature to even leaving a parcel in the middle of the road at the top of the driveway!) I avoid them. However, I didn't know the company I purchased the product from used DHL until it was too late, and, true to form, with their latest 'delivery attempt' they've shown me justified in avoiding them!

Incompetence and lies. Not a great look...

name: DHL
reviewer_title: Lazy driver claims not to be able to…
reviewer_review: Lazy driver claims not to be able to find address. Even with postcode, full address and directions. House has been here for 150 years +. Drivers are to lazy to deliver to countryside! Called DHL 3 days in a row.

name: DHL
reviewer_title: DO NOT USE THIS USELESS COMPANY!
reviewer_review:
DESPICABLE!!! Waited in all day for a parcel to be delivered. Kept checking their website & it said it was being delivered that day. Nothing arrived! Next day, another message to say the same. 
It arrived with a man who dumped it on the doorstep & moved quickly away, before I had time to pick it up. The package although very well wrapped with bubble wrap, was split & I could see the item was damaged. Looked to contact DHL, impossible! 
Contacted the supplier & they kindly resent the item. 
It was left on my doorstep (although on their site it said it was received by me!) by a man yelling into his phone in a foreign language. That noise was frightening & by the time I got to the door he was gone.
The parcel had FRAGILE tape all over it & yet it arrived SPLIT & DAMAGED AGAIN!!!

name: DHL
reviewer_title: diy couriers????
reviewer_review:
Bought a label Saturday 15/03, hoping to print in store, as advertised. Drove around for 2 hours, 3 of the shops that were open, could not recognize my barcode (plus info on opening times on DHL site were wrong) The 4th store, shut down a long time ago. So, back home and issued another barcode, so Sunday, about 3 hours driving around, same story. Finally Sunday night, a collection was scheduled for Monday, anytime from 8am to 6pm, had to rush to the library to print a label at 9am (the very reason i opted for the service in the 1st place, no printer) - So, i waited in all-day, at 16.45 i contacted customer services who assured me, it will be picked up by 6pm. That came and went, at 6.15 approx, back to customer services, who wanted to re schedule until the next day? Upon asking where my nearest depot was, i was informed it was about 7 miles away from my house and i had until 7pm if i wanted to drop it off, which i eventually had to, as my customer, the recipient of the item, had been waiting for delivery a.s.a.p - So i dropped it off myself, something i could have easily done in the 1st place. Upon trying to get any resolve from DHL they offered me a £5 pre paid voucher, as if?? I would ever trust them with another package..  I thought Evri was bad, but this outfit is another level.. AVOID AT ALL COSTS IF YOU CAN....
As everyone else is saying, would have given no stars if i had the choice. I hope, in fact i know, people read these reviews, only wish i had before getting involved with what appears to be a business that will not last much longer if this is how customers are treated....

JUST TO ADD, TRACKING IS STILL NOT UPDATED, ALTHOUGH DELIVERED...

reviewer_review: Everything about DHL is terrible, i ordered something from outside the EU and it said it was included in the customers clearance, forcing me to fill out this form demanding my birth number but when i entered it, it said it was not registered in the database. WELL HELLO MAYBE ASK YOUR CUSTOMER TO CREATE A USER BEFORE DOING THIS??? and EVEN when i created a user it STILL didn't find my birth number in their database because... WHEN MAKING A USER THEY DONT ASK FOR IT, i SCAVENGED thew internet trying to figure out how to get an eori number or to register my birth number and it was desolate. even then when i figured out how to make a user the english version was for people who live in germany??? then when i clicked for people living outside germany it made the whole form german then when i tried switching it to english it took me to the home page and i could no longer find the form. I didnt even choose to ship with DHL and i never will again, can i possibly switch the shipping company because i cannot bear this?

reviewer_review:
TERRIBLE service, I was informed that my parcel would be delivered on a certain date, which it is, and the time 12:52 to 13:52 that time has long gone, while writing this the time is 17:36 and ticking    .....TERRIBLE SERVICE!!!!
NOTICE, just arrived at 18:12/13, only 5 hours and a bit LATE, waste of a day!!!

name: DHL
reviewer_title: The only way to get DHL to listen
reviewer_review:
Not only is this company bad, they clearly don't care. Thousands of 1 star reviews - the vast majority - and yet they address none of the issues. In my case another delivery where they failed to deliver 2 days running, giving lies about running late until it's suddenly back at the depot after keeping me waiting in all day. Twice!
Added to that there's absolutely no way you can get hold of anyone to complain. I wonder why?!!
Everyone needs to complain to the companies that use them (mainly apple by the looks of it) . Frankly it IS their fault as they must be aware of the reputation of DHL and yet still choose to use them. Cheaper maybe?
So we all must ensure we complain to the company we buy the product from - it's the only way DHL will ever take any notice if the companies stop using them!

name: DHL
reviewer_title: Effective and Efficient Service rendering on waybill no: 2170119162
reviewer_review:
To Whom It May Concern,

I am pleased to commend JULIUS ONILEOWO for an exceptional service rendered to us at Intertek testing Nig Limited
On Wednesday 5th March 2025 
We had a sample for testing with Waybill no: 2170119162 that was needed to send urgently but the phytosanitary certificate was not ready on time, we got it at a late hour in the evening,
We were so concerned on how to meet up with sending the shipment, as it's very urgent but Mr Julius came through for us by picking sample same day at about 1900hr.

  Julius, haven heard about it, selflessly volunteered to pick up the shipment, demonstrating unwavering commitment to meeting our needs 

Thanks to Mr Julius' extraordinary efforts, the shipment was promptly delivered on Friday 7th March, exceeding our expectations.

Mr Julius Onileowo (Apapa Branch) represents DHL in such inspiring manners,
 
 His commendable efforts have made a significant impact on our business which made us to meet our turn around hours for Quality result delivery to Our Clients.

Mr. Julius has shown commitment on several urgent request, and he do meet up with our demands.


Thank you, DHL, for the excellent service representative. 

Sincerely,

Otega Okareko
Operation coordination Assistant
Intertek testing Services Nig Limited

name: DHL
reviewer_title: The entire DHL experience was a…costly horrific nightmare
reviewer_review: The entire DHL experience was a nightmare with very few exceptions. I was charged $1000 for transporting one suitcase from the U.S. to Portugal. Apparently, I was not given the correct forms that would itemize and show the value of my shipment. The suitcase was stuck in customs in Portugal for two weeks; there was a customer service number for DHL Portugal but it would only ring through to an automated message and hang up. I finally drove an hour to the DHL office to straighten the issue out; they said that they needed a form that they had sent to be returned through their website. Their website would not allow me to attach and return the document. I contacted DHL in the U.S. For the first time, someone was helpful and said that I could send them the form and that they would forward it on; however two days later I was told by DHL Portugal that I had not fulfilled their requirement and that my suitcase would be immediately returned to the U.S. It was impossible to get help from DHL in Portugal and the help from the U.S. was difficult to find and many times clueless. On top of everything else, none of my $1000+ was refunded for the incredible inconvenience. I'd never do business with DHL again and I'd strongly recommend you don't either.

reviewer_review:
Bought a label Saturday 15/03, hoping to print in store, as advertised. Drove around for 2 hours, 3 of the shops that were open, could not recognize my barcode (plus info on opening times on DHL site were wrong) The 4th store, shut down a long time ago. So, back home and issued another barcode, so Sunday, about 3 hours driving around, same story. Finally Sunday night, a collection was scheduled for Monday, anytime from 8am to 6pm, had to rush to the library to print a label at 9am (the very reason i opted for the service in the 1st place, no printer) - So, i waited in all-day, at 16.45 i contacted customer services who assured me, it will be picked up by 6pm. That came and went, at 6.15 approx, back to customer services, who wanted to re schedule until the next day? Upon asking where my nearest depot was, i was informed it was about 7 miles away from my house and i had until 7pm if i wanted to drop it off, which i eventually had to, as my customer, the recipient of the item, had been waiting for delivery a.s.a.p - So i dropped it off myself, something i could have easily done in the 1st place. Upon trying to get any resolve from DHL they offered me a £5 pre paid voucher, as if?? I would ever trust them with another package..  I thought Evri was bad, but this outfit is another level.. AVOID AT ALL COSTS IF YOU CAN....
As everyone else is saying, would have given no stars if i had the choice. I hope, in fact i know, people read these reviews, only wish i had before getting involved with what appears to be a business that will not last much longer if this is how customers are treated....

JUST TO ADD, TRACKING IS STILL NOT UPDATED, ALTHOUGH DELIVERED...

name: DHL

reviewer_review: Would leave 0 if I could. Most useless outfit ever put on earth. Would not know the truth if kicking them up the butt. Attempt delivery but no one home, I phoned and said I was home all day and cctv to prove it. Then said sent to wrong depot.

Not sure what do they have local affiliate if they're using local post office (which is next level bad) to deliver their packages.

And of course, they've isolated themselves from any complaints or issue solving. no way you can get to the email or phone number. INSANE. I'm going to skip all the retailers that do business with them.

name: DHL

name: DHL
reviewer_title: How are they still in business?
reviewer_review:
DHL have been nothing short of atrocious when I've had the misfortune to have to deal with them. The latest debacle was a parcel ordered from an online retailer on Next Day delivery on Thursday 13th March. The DHL tracking information said it had been received at their depot and was then out for delivery at 10:36 on Friday 14th March and was stop number 44. Sorry, but for starters who, when they have at least 44 parcels to deliver, doesn't start delivering til after 10:30? So it already didn't look good...

The tracker stopped updating at 'The driver is heading to stop 39' at around 7pm and then stated that my parcel had been signed back into the depot at around 8pm. Despite it being their fault it wasn't delivered, no attempt was made at redelivery until Monday 17th March, when I wasn't in - I had requested the delivery for the Friday for a reason, knowing the parcel had to be signed for and I would be in. As I wasn't in, the parcel was left half hanging through the letterbox and wasn't signed for because I wasn't there - for reference, the parcel was an expensive piece of PC hardware.

Customer services were, unsurprisingly, unhelpful and avoiding answering any questions and just saying sorry for the delay. Eventually, I got a 'the depot have said the drivers will be spoken to' about the delivery without a signature and hanging out of the letterbox aspect but the overall delay was ignored. I pressed for a reason for the delay and was eventually lied to, being told my parcel was "unable to be delivered as it could not be located at the time of the delivery attempt." And still no explanation as to why a parcel couldn't be found in a van - it was hardly a needle in a haystack...

...However, the fact that is, they have told an outright lie in the face of the facts! Their own tracker shows that the driver made delivery stop 38 then turned round and went back to the depot - the tracker said the driver was heading for stop 39 for about an hour then said they were back at the depot. No attempt was made to deliver my parcel, it's blatantly obvious that the driver made stop number 38 and then turned around and went back to the depot, either because their driving time was up or they decided it was too late and they wanted to go home.

I confess I don't know exactly how it works but either DHL overloaded the driver and there was no way they would be able to deliver all the parcels in their driving time, or they just decided "it's getting late, I think I'll go home." Regardless, DHL continue to avoid giving answers about this and then when pressed, have just lied instead.

And to be clear, after numerous poor experiences with DHL over the years (later deliveries, insisting something has been delivered when it hasn't, leaving signed for parcels at someone else's address without a signature to even leaving a parcel in the middle of the road at the top of the driveway!) I avoid them. However, I didn't know the company I purchased the product from used DHL until it was too late, and, true to form, with their latest 'delivery attempt' they've shown me justified in avoiding them!

Incompetence and lies. Not a great look...

name: DHL
reviewer_title: Lazy driver claims not to be able to…
reviewer_review: Lazy driver claims not to be able to find address. Even with postcode, full address and directions. House has been here for 150 years +. Drivers are to lazy to deliver to countryside! Called DHL 3 days in a row.

name: DHL
reviewer_title: DO NOT USE THIS USELESS COMPANY!
reviewer_review:
DESPICABLE!!! Waited in all day for a parcel to be delivered. Kept checking their website & it said it was being delivered that day. Nothing arrived! Next day, another message to say the same. 
It arrived with a man who dumped it on the doorstep & moved quickly away, before I had time to pick it up. The package although very well wrapped with bubble wrap, was split & I could see the item was damaged. Looked to contact DHL, impossible! 
Contacted the supplier & they kindly resent the item. 
It was left on my doorstep (although on their site it said it was received by me!) by a man yelling into his phone in a foreign language. That noise was frightening & by the time I got to the door he was gone.
The parcel had FRAGILE tape all over it & yet it arrived SPLIT & DAMAGED AGAIN!!!

name: DHL

reviewer_review: At this point my package has been held i Hungary for 12 days. I live in Denmark and could have picked it up and been back 4 times in that time.

reviewer_review:
Said the delivery was attempted but noone showed up.
I was at home all day, they said they left a calling card but nothing received.

name: DHL
reviewer_title: Everything about DHL is terrible
reviewer_review: Everything about DHL is terrible, i ordered something from outside the EU and it said it was included in the customers clearance, forcing me to fill out this form demanding my birth number but when i entered it, it said it was not registered in the database. WELL HELLO MAYBE ASK YOUR CUSTOMER TO CREATE A USER BEFORE DOING THIS??? and EVEN when i created a user it STILL didn't find my birth number in their database because... WHEN MAKING A USER THEY DONT ASK FOR IT, i SCAVENGED thew internet trying to figure out how to get an eori number or to register my birth number and it was desolate. even then when i figured out how to make a user the english version was for people who live in germany??? then when i clicked for people living outside germany it made the whole form german then when i tried switching it to english it took me to the home page and i could no longer find the form. I didnt even choose to ship with DHL and i never will again, can i possibly switch the shipping company because i cannot bear this?

That becomes being funny tbh

name: DHL
reviewer_title: TERRIBLE service
reviewer_review:
TERRIBLE service, I was informed that my parcel would be delivered on a certain date, which it is, and the time 12:52 to 13:52 that time has long gone, while writing this the time is 17:36 and ticking    .....TERRIBLE SERVICE!!!!
NOTICE, just arrived at 18:12/13, only 5 hours and a bit LATE, waste of a day!!!

name: DHL
reviewer_title: The only way to get DHL to listen
reviewer_review:
Not only is this company bad, they clearly don't care. Thousands of 1 star reviews - the vast majority - and yet they address none of the issues. In my case another delivery where they failed to deliver 2 days running, giving lies about running late until it's suddenly back at the depot after keeping me waiting in all day. Twice!
Added to that there's absolutely no way you can get hold of anyone to complain. I wonder why?!!
Everyone needs to complain to the companies that use them (mainly apple by the looks of it) . Frankly it IS their fault as they must be aware of the reputation of DHL and yet still choose to use them. Cheaper maybe?
So we all must ensure we complain to the company we buy the product from - it's the only way DHL will ever take any notice if the companies stop using them!

name: DHL
reviewer_title: Effective and Efficient Service rendering on waybill no: 2170119162
reviewer_review:
To Whom It May Concern,

I am pleased to commend JULIUS ONILEOWO for an exceptional service rendered to us at Intertek testing Nig Limited
On Wednesday 5th March 2025 
We had a sample for testing with Waybill no: 2170119162 that was needed to send urgently but the phytosanitary certificate was not ready on time, we got it at a late hour in the evening,
We were so concerned on how to meet up with sending the shipment, as it's very urgent but Mr Julius came through for us by picking sample same day at about 1900hr.

  Julius, haven heard about it, selflessly volunteered to pick up the shipment, demonstrating unwavering commitment to meeting our needs 

Thanks to Mr Julius' extraordinary efforts, the shipment was promptly delivered on Friday 7th March, exceeding our expectations.

Mr Julius Onileowo (Apapa Branch) represents DHL in such inspiring manners,
 
 His commendable efforts have made a significant impact on our business which made us to meet our turn around hours for Quality result delivery to Our Clients.

Mr. Julius has shown commitment on several urgent request, and he do meet up with our demands.


Thank you, DHL, for the excellent service representative. 

Sincerely,

Otega Okareko
Operation coordination Assistant
Intertek testing Services Nig Limited

Your the ones who's messing up. I've told the company to never send my stuff threw DHL ever or I won't do business with them again.

name: DHL

reviewer_review: Ordered a fruit basket for a new mother, got nominated day delivery. DHL lied about a delivery attempt. My smart doorbell confirms no one showed up. No call, no card, just a false status update. Ruined a thoughtful gift.

name: DHL
reviewer_title: DHL IS HORRIBLE SERVICE
reviewer_review: I only gave one star because I can't give 0 stars if I could give 0 stars to DHL delivery company. I would definitely give them a 0. The service is crappy, the customer service sucks the delivery serviceis horrible. You guys are liars. You say you call my phone number, but you don't you say you come to my house, but you didn't. Then you send me an email that says oh sorry, we missed you because you were not at home at the time of the delivery.  Really?  Come on, DHL this is bad.  SMH.
